original: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekādasa …pe… sahajāte ekūnavīsa …pe… āsevane cha …pe… vipāke terasa …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa.

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa

original: Upādinnupādāniyo dhammo naupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Upādinnupādāniyo dhammo naanupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo …pe….

original: Upādinnupādāniyo dhammo naanupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

original: Upādinnupādāniyo dhammo naanupādinnaanupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

original: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo naanupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ na anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo naupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ na aupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

analyzed: anupādinna anupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ na anupādinna anupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ pe pañca

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā ekādasa, anantare soḷasa …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe pannarasa adhipatiyā ekādasa anantare soḷasa pe sahajāte

original: ekūnavīsa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye tevīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte soḷasa,

original: pacchājāte pannarasa, āsevane pañca, kamme pannarasa, vipāke dasa, āhāre vīsa, indriye

original: jhāne magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte soḷasa …pe… avigate chattiṁsa. (Pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
